means: <贬>（好像）缺乏思维能力的，无才智的，愚蠢的

sentence.Network_en: The assassination attempt that failed in July 1944 was witless and traitorous.
sentence.Network_cn: 1944年7月以失败而告终的那个暗杀企图即无头脑,又失信义.

sentence.Network_en: One day, this witless gentleman got a rather strange idea.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一天, 这位有勇无谋的绅士产生了一个非常古怪的念头.

sentence.Network_en: A pestilence on the witless little dunce!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2010年12月3日 - 詹姆斯所作的决定,还有球迷用谐音篡改了当年詹姆斯的广告语(witness见证者)现在在詹姆斯代言的品牌旁边出现的是witless(无知的),来讽刺詹姆斯当时无知的.
英语词汇后缀 - 09教育技术的日志 - 网易博客 ... intermost 最内的 witless 无智的 countless 无数的.

RelatedPhrase.word: A pestilence on the witless little dunce

list.key: A pestilence on the witless little dunce
list.abs: A pestilence on the witless little dunce !, 该死的蠢丫头!

RelatedPhrase.word: pestilence on the witless little dunce

list.key: pestilence on the witless little dunce
list.abs: A pestilence on the witless little dunce !, 该死的蠢丫头!

entry.def: If you describe something or someone as witless, you mean that they are very foolish or stupid.

example.tran: 极为肤浅、令人作呕的新闻报道

means.word_mean: 1. (of especially persons) lacking sense or understanding or judgment

auth_sentence.content: What's with all the pointless, witless filler?
auth_sentence.res_content: What's with all the pointless, witless filler?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What's with all the pointless, witless filler?

auth_sentence.content: It drives me witless to have to agree with Mrs Betts, but I do.
auth_sentence.res_content: It drives me witless to have to agree with Mrs Betts, but I do.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It drives me witless to have to agree with Mrs Betts, but I do.

auth_sentence.content: Henry's book turns out wonderfully, but this redounds entirely to the witless actor's credit.
auth_sentence.res_content: Henry's book turns out wonderfully, but this redounds entirely to the witless actor's credit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Henry's book turns out wonderfully, but this redounds entirely to the witless actor's credit.
